description: I don't see how it's rated 4 stars when it won't even start and there are no reviews listed.
summary: won't start on Ubuntu Linux 18.10 -- May 2020

description: don't waste your time on this till they fix it

It seems to be nice, but it's not very user friendly. I also couldn't find any way of importing vocabulary / flash cards / CVC files you already have in your computer. This is really bad if you've already spent lots of time creating your own vocab list tailored for your needs.

The app launches fine on Ubuntu 20.04, and everything seems to work well. The collections download page isn't very well moderated (that is stated, however), so a lot of collections have things like missing pictures. Other than that it seems to be fine.
summary: Works fine, UI needs a bit of work

description: Prinzipiell ist es ein sehr gutes Programm, um Vokabeln zu lernen, aber das Programm hat ein sehr großes Problem - die Möglichkeit zu Speichern ist nicht gegeben. Wenn man versucht etwas zu speichern, dann steht immer etwas, das ungefähr so aussieht: "ungültige Daiteiendung".
summary: Idee ist gut, aber Umsetzung nicht

description: Einfach zu bedienendes Vokabelprogramm .Macht was es soll. Eintragungen müssen natürlich mit der richtigen Dateiendung abgespeichert werden. Vielen Danke
Very good! I fond this program highly useful
